entities.name: stan
entities.description: Stan is a person who is still rubbing his chest and is talking to Harry about Sirius Black. ("Yeah," said Stan, still rubbing his chest.)

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is a person who is listening to Stan's story about Sirius Black. (Harry nervously ﬂattened his bangs down again.)

entities.name: you-know-o
entities.description: You-Know-Oo is a character who was defeated by Harry Potter. (Very close to You-Know-’Oo, they say.)

entities.name: sirius black
entities.description: Sirius Black is a person who thought he would be second-in-command once You-Know-Oo had taken over. (I ‘eard he thought ’e’d be second-in-command once You-Know-’Oo ’ad taken over.)

entities.name: ern
entities.description: Ern is a person who is being addressed by Stan. (wasn’t they, Ern?)

relationships.description: Stan is saying that Sirius Black thought he would be second-in-command once You-Know-Oo had taken over. (I ‘eard he thought ’e’d be second-in-command once You-Know-’Oo ’ad taken over.)

Stan is saying that Sirius Black was cornered by him in the middle of a street full of Muggles. (Anyway, they cornered Black in the middle of a street full of Muggles an’ Black took out ’is wand and ’e blasted ’alf the street apart,)
Stan is saying that Sirius Black went with reinforcements from the Ministry of Magic. (An’ when reinforcements from the Ministry of Magic got there, ’e went wiv ’em quiet as anyﬁnk,)
